descriptor.select: SELECT value FROM entity_descriptor WHERE entity_id=? AND key=?
descriptor.update: UPDATE entity_descriptor SET value=? AND updatedAt=now() WHERE entity_id=? AND key=?
descriptor.insert: INSERT INTO entity_descriptor (entity_id, key, value) VALUES (?, ?, ?)

entity.update: UPDATE entity SET description=? WHERE id=?

mic.update: UPDATE metric_identity_card SET description=? AND sample_interval=? WHERE id=?

alarms.select: SELECT * FROM alarms WHERE correlate_key=? AND entity_id=?
alarms.insert: INSERT INTO alarms (uuid, message, severity, correlate_key, entity_id) VALUES(uuid(), ?, ?, ?, ?)
alarms.update: UPDATE alarms SET message=? AND severity=? AND occurence=? AND updatedAt=now() WHERE id=?
alarms.delete: DELETE FROM alarms WHERE correlate_key=? AND entity_id=?
